messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Anyone here have children that love and are proactive when it comes to animals?
messages.msgSnippet: Google Chase Pickering. I think it *may* be www.ChasePickering.com He s not an unschooler. Should be though!  He s a photographer. Amazing stuff! ~Kelly
messages.messageBody:
Google Chase Pickering. I think it *may* be www.ChasePickering.com

He's not an unschooler. Should be though! <g> He's a photographer.
Amazing stuff!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

-----Original Message-----
From: aplan4life <aplan4life@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Mon, 1 May 2006 11:34:21 -0000
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Anyone here have children that love and
are proactive when it comes to animals?

Brooke wants to make an endangered animals website and have sections
for Zoos(she is an AVID Zoo Tycooner Gal :-)) she'd like to have some
link to places that are active in saving animals too. Wondering if
anyone here as any children that have a website that she could link
hers too and possible an email so she can keep in contact with other
animal lovers. Perhaps some could recommend reputable animal sites
that allow people to link from a site to their site? I'll be actively
searching today for this information but would love some
recommendations should anyone have any.

Thanks
~Sandy

I was thinking that it would be so cool for her to have her own
PODCAST! WooHoo!






Yahoo! Groups Links
